instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message:
Clean board battery charges to 100% fine, discharges down to around 50% just fine, but around 50% the battery icon turns red, battery stays around 50% for a little bit then it drops to around 5%, computer sometimes also restarts randomly.

2 Known good batteries and same exact result.

I checked board and looks clean, also tested with different external OS and same thing.

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message:
Machine restarts only when battery is connected?
Same with charger plus battery, even above 50%?
Did you test its battery in other machine?

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message:
We have not been able to replicate restart problem at all.
We have only tested with battery only.
2 known good batteries.

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message:
Tested with new chinese batteries?

I'm not sure about your reply.
The problem didn't appear with its battery installed in other machine?

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message: I don't have another machine to test, we have been using this vendor and same batteries for years, they are not cheap and work great on all other machines in the past.

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message: Almost certainly bad batteries. "New" doesn't mean "known good".

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message: Thanks, I have an old original battery that I will test and see.

threads.title: 820-00426 Battery charging issues
threads.message: Battery problem, seems like supplier changed Chinese and now new batteries are crap...
